questions.question: I could answer only ……………………. questions.
questions.description: Use few with plural nouns. Use a few to indicate a small number.

questions.question: We haven’t got …………………. money.
questions.description: Use much before an uncountable noun without an article or another determiner.

questions.question: He doesn’t have …………………….. patience.
questions.description: Use much before an uncountable noun without an article or another determiner.

questions.question: …………………….. them approved the plan.
questions.description: Use many of before a pronoun.

questions.question: You ask too ………………………… questions.
questions.description: Use many before a plural noun.

questions.question: ……………………… time is required to learn a new language.
questions.description: Use much before an uncountable noun.

questions.question: Bullying is a problem that affects ………………………. children.
questions.description: Use many before a plural noun.

questions.question: I have had ……………………. ups and downs in my life.
We are very ………………………. obliged for your assistance.
He spends ……………………. his time reading.
questions.description: Use much of before an uncountable noun with an article or another determiner.
